inclusion.criterion: approximately 1-2 weeks prior to her expected date of follow up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: conversation and invited to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: interviewed by the clinical research nurse using the format of the prepared proforma (Form A)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptoms suggestive of disease recurrence as well as treatment induced toxicity are recorded
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: short written informed consent is taken
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: physical examination and any investigations are performed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: final impression of disease status and toxicity are noted down
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: information regarding the acceptability of nurse-led telephonic follow-up is collected
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: financial impact of physical follow- up is collected
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient can be contacted by telephone
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Stage III disease treated with palliative intent with once monthly radiotherapy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Early stage cervical cancer patients who underwent Wertheims hysterectomy and who have completed adjuvant radiochemotherapy due to high-risk factors
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are unable to comprehend the questions or dialogue over telephone by medical staff
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who seem unreliable for follow up
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has a history of unsuccessful use of antiobesity agents and appetite suppressants.
